title: RumPerfInfo
description: Schema of properties for a technical performance metic

view_min.description: The minimum value seen for this metic during the view's lifetime.

view_max.description: The maximum value seen for this metic during the view's lifetime.

view_average.description: The minimum value seen for this metic during the view's lifetime.

metric_max.description: The maximum value we could see for this metic during this session.
